THIS IS FALLBACK MESSAGE FOR OLD BROWSERS YOUR BROWSER IS NOT SUPPORTING CANVAS

Collisions are calculated for each existing pair of balls, not only consequtive ones, as well as using Pythagorean theorem to detect the collisions, as opposed to checking collisions of the onclosing boxes (|x1 - x2| < r1 + r2 || |y1 - y2| < r1 + r2), therefore improving the solution presented in the tutorial by Alperen Talaslıoğlu
